name: Xingqiu
desc: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

battle_talent.normal_desc2: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
battle_talent.normal_desc3: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
battle_talent.element_desc:
Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing Hydro DMG. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit your active character.
The Rain Swords have the following properties:
When a character takes DMG, the Rain Sword will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken.
Increase the character's resistance to interruption.
20% of Xingqiu's Hydro DMG Bonus will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Swords. The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%.
The initial maximum number of Rain Swords is 3.
Using this ability applies the Wet status onto the character.
battle_talent.final_desc:
Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords.

Rainbow Bladework:
Your active character's Normal Attacks will trigger consecutive sword rain attacks, dealing Hydro DMG.
Rain Swords will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability's duration.
These effects carry over to other characters.

basic_talent.talent1_desc: When a Rain Sword is shattered or when its duration expires, it regenerates the current character's HP based on 6% of Xingqiu's Max HP.
basic_talent.talent2_desc: Xingqiu gains a 20% Hydro DMG Bonus.
basic_talent.talent3_desc: When Xingqiu crafts Character Talent Materials, he has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

sof.sof1_desc: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.
sof.sof2_desc: Extends the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3s. Decreases the Hydro RES of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.
sof.sof3_desc: Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof4_desc: Throughout the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter, the DMG dealt by Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen is increased by 50%.
sof.sof5_desc: Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof6_name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
sof.sof6_desc: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword: Raincutter's sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.
